candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (2 votes): claude_haiku: Retail trading platform with meme stock DNA (Robinhood narrative). Highly correlated to retail trading volume/sentiment cycles. Volatility tied to retail trading activity cycles and crypto markets. Currently undervalued relative to user growth, with potential for sharp reversal when retail sentiment improves.
